body:
Hey guys...

Seen as the rugby world cup is in full swing I thought I'd make a post containing all the fixtures and results.

Although it isn't as big as the football world cup, more people have been watching it than any other tournament in the past; I personally love and play the sport so I hope some others on Avicus do too.

This Tournament:

In this tournament, there are 20 teams competing; 4 groups of 5 teams each. The groups/pools go as follows:

POOL A- Wales, England (host nation), Australia, Fiji, Uruguay

POOL B- Scotland, South Africa, Samoa, Japan, U.S.A

POOL C- New Zealand, Tonga, Argentina, Georgia, Namibia

POOL D- Ireland, France, Italy, Canada, Romania

Fixtures and Results:

England 35-11 Fiji

Tonga 10-17 Georgia

Ireland 50-7 Canada

South Africa 32-34 Japan (JAPAN CARRY)

France 32-10 Italy

Samoa 25-16 U.S.A

Wales 54-9 Uruguay

New Zealand 26-16 Argentina

Scotland 45-10 Japan

Australia 28-13 Fiji

France 38-11 Romania

New Zealand 58-14 Namibia

Argentina 54-9 Georgia

Italy 23-18 Canada

South Africa 46-6 Samoa

England 25-28 Wales

Australia 65-3 Uruguay

Scotland 39-16 U.S.A

Ireland 44-10 Romania

Tonga 35-21 Namibia

Wales 23-13 Fiji

France 48-18 Canada

New Zealand 43-10 Georgia

Samoa 5-26 Japan

South Africa 34-16 Scotland

England 13-33 Australia


Quarter Finals!

South Africa vs Wales- SOUTH AFRICA

New Zealand vs France- NEW ZEALAND

Ireland vs Argentina- ARGENTINA

Australia vs Scotland- AUSTRALIA

Semi-Finals!

South Africa vs New Zealand - NEW ZEALAND

Argentina vs Australia - AUSTRALIA


Final!

Australia vs New Zealand

New Zealand come out on top with a 34-17 win!


WINNERS: New Zealand!

replies.body:
New Zealand's gonna win because I'm totally not biased :P

Seriously though, NZ's guaranteed to get into the quarter finals because all the team's in their pool are minos. 

England on the other hand are in some trouble, if they loose to Australia, they're pretty much screwed. 
Gotta love not being in that pool of death xD

And Japan's upset victory over South Africa! Holy hell that was astonishing!

Honestly though. I can definitely see New Zealand winning the world cup for a third time.
replies.body_tagged:
New Zealand's gonna win because I'm totally not biased :P

Seriously though, NZ's guaranteed to get into the quarter finals because all the team's in their pool are minos. 

England on the other hand are in some trouble, if they loose to Australia, they're pretty much screwed. 
Gotta love not being in that pool of death xD

And Japan's upset victory over South Africa! Holy hell that was astonishing!

Honestly though. I can definitely see New Zealand winning the world cup for a third time.
